Body:
"""Tests expected to fail because of a badly formatted data_isotopes."""
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    hrcor.MetaboliteCorrectorFactory('C', '13C', data_isotopes=bad_dataiso)
pytest.mark.parametrize('bad_dataiso', [{'C': {}}, {'C': {'masses': [],
    'abundance': []}}, {'C': {'mass': [12, 13], 'abundance': [1.0]}}, {'C':
    {'mass': [12, 13], 'abundance': [1.0, 1.0]}}, {'C': {'mass': [12, 14],
    'abundance': [0.5, 0.5]}}])
